page.title: 18"A Funeral"
page.content: On Tuesday the 4th of June there was a funeral, it was my grandmas. She was 85 years old when she died. We drove to the funeral home in our car. While we were there I went to see my grandma and I kissed her. Then we set off to the crematorium. My grandma was taken in a big black funeral car called a hearse. All of my grandmas relations and friends followed the hearse to the crematorium. There were a lot of flowers and some bouquets. We said some prayers. Then she was cremated. After that we went for a meal with the family and some friends. Then we all went home.
